name: Spy Convention
description:
My entry for Brackeys Jam 2022!

Move with WASD

NOTE: Arrows on “Spies” are clickable to change sprite

It's the time of year where spies from around the world come together for The Spy Convention. Spies come in disguise to practice their craft with each other.

You are Security. You have received word that an innocent civilian has accidentally wandered in, unaware that the guests they are partying with are ruthless spies. If you don't get them out in time, you can't guarantee their safety...

Use the Spies tab to keep track of clues and who you think each spy might be.

Github Source: https://github.com/MichaelHaughian/SpyConvention

All assets created by me EXCEPT:

Background crowd noise: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/crowd/

Pixel Text: https://fontesk.com/player-sans-mono-typeface/

Gun Shot Sound: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-sound-effects-download/gun-shooting...

Radar Sound: https://notification-sounds.com/430-sonar-sound-effect.html

Fizzy Tablet Sound: https://notification-sounds.com/214-fizzy-tablet-sound-effect.html

SimplePixelUI: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/simple-free-pixel-art-styled-ui-pack-165012
